references.paper_title: 360DVD: Controllable Panorama Video Generation with 360-degree Video Diffusion Model
references.reason: This paper introduces 360DVD, a state-of-the-art method for generating 360° panoramic videos, which serves as a primary comparison point and highlights the limitations that DynamicScaler aims to overcome.

references.paper_title: VideoCrafter2: Overcoming Data Limitations for High-Quality Video Diffusion Models
references.reason: DynamicScaler builds upon VideoCrafter2, leveraging its capabilities for text-to-video generation and adapting it for panoramic video synthesis.

references.paper_title: DynamiCrafter: Animating Open-Domain Images with Video Diffusion Priors
references.reason: This work provides the image-to-video generation model DynamiCrafter, which is used by DynamicScaler as a base model for image-conditioned panoramic video generation.

references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving Latent Diffusion Models for High-Resolution Image Synthesis
references.reason: This paper highlights the challenges of high-resolution image synthesis and is relevant to DynamicScaler's goal of generating high-quality panoramic videos.
It addresses 4K resolution video generation in a 360° context using a different technique and thus serves as another point of comparison for DynamicScaler.
